<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Make cmdb_ci entry active for custom retirement status</description>
        <name>CMDB Data Manager Use Custom Fields</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!GlidePluginManager.isZboot() && GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.cmdb.csdm.activation')) {
	var grPolicyAttr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_data_management_policy_runtime_attributes');
	grPolicyAttr.addEncodedQuery('status=Published^policy.cmdb_policy_type=66306fcb7352201026f6aa114df6a77c^ORpolicy.cmdb_policy_type=b82b20d00731201017b703767cd300e1^ORpolicy.cmdb_policy_type=562bec900731201017b703767cd300e7');
	grPolicyAttr.query();
	var hasPublishedPolicies = grPolicyAttr.hasNext();
	
    var grRetDef = new GlideRecord('cmdb_retirement_custom_definitions');
    grRetDef.addQuery('table', 'cmdb_ci');
    grRetDef.query();
    if (grRetDef.getRowCount() == 1 && grRetDef.next() && hasPublishedPolicies) {
        gs.log("Making cmdb_ci entry active for definition of 'Retired'");
        grRetDef.setValue('active', true);
        grRetDef.update();

        var grBusRule = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
        //Following sys_id is for Business Rule "Cascade retire for custom definitions"
        var ruleSysId = '402709a0b72695102455c3fdde11a9d5';
        if(grBusRule.get(ruleSysId)) {
            grBusRule.setValue('active', true);
            grBusRule.update();
        }
    }
}]]></script>
